description:
'''Short description:'''

Arctic sea ice L3 data in separate monthly files. The time series is based on reprocessed radar altimeter satellite data from Envisat and CryoSat and is available in the freezing season between October and April. The product is brokered from the Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3S).

'''DOI (product) :'''   
https://doi.org/10.48670/moi-00127
title: Arctic Ocean - Sea Ice Thickness REPROCESSED

providers.name: Copernicus Marine Service
providers.description: Copernicus Marine Service - Mercator Ocean International
